title: **SOLD**1908 Morgan Bulkeley Hall of Fame RC and one of a kind Ribbon
author: JMANOS

posts.post_title: **SOLD**1908 Morgan Bulkeley Hall of Fame RC and one of a kind Ribbon
posts.post_content:
$200 vintage professionally framed with a ribbon with Buckeley photo on, a RPPC of the the Hartford bridge, a pin back and also included is his RC postcard sorry can't get a better scan. I have on eBay at a higher price if u want to see a better scan with a magnifier.

Ribbon I have never seen with Morgan Bulkeley photo on the ribbon.

email me at [url]jmanos6@att.net[/url] if u want a better scan

ribbon, pin and both pcs original from 1908
